name: Microsoft Visio Workflow Interchange File
summary: A VWI file contains a workflow chart saved in the Visio Workflow Interchange format. It is an archive that stores several files, including .XML files, which contain information about a sequence of steps or tasks that make up a workflow. VWI files are often used by business analysts to share IT workflows between Microsoft Visio and Microsoft SharePoint Designer.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
